data.title: Live Music — Start Line Brewing Company
data.text:
Jennifer Tefft and the Strange

Come see what all the buzz is about! Recently named Female Performer of the Year by the New England Music Awards and called "The most compelling performer in Boston" by If It's Too Loud, Jennifer Tefft & The Strange's live shows have been called "electric", "mesmerizing" and "a band that should be playing stadiums in front of thousands of people". Make your plans now for this Free, All Ages show on August 10th. Show 7-9pm. Seating and occupancy may be limited. Show is weather dependent (patio is uncovered).

Jennifer Tefft and the Strange Social

View Event →

Hurry Sundown

Start Line Brewing welcomes back Hurry Sundown. a band who enjoy them some Country Western Rock. Join us for this special performance by some tried and true musicians. A full band and a full night of great tunes. No charge. Show is weather dependent as our patio is not covered. Seating and occupancy is limited.

View Event →

Hot Acoustics

Please join Start Line Brewing for a very special performance by Hot Acoustics on July 27th, 6 to 9 PM. Fan favorites, Hot Acoustics are a local four-piece high-energy band that have a big following and always deliver. Tickets are $15 for general admission and are required for entrance into the patio event space, starting at 5 PM. Seating is first come, first serve.

Buy Tickets via Eventbrite Here

Check out Hot Acoustics’ socials here! Facebook

View Event →

TIM and JIM

Join us for a little bit of country and a little bit of Rock and Roll! Country music artist Tim Buono and Rock artist James Hewitt of “The Phase” and “The 45” team up for an acoustic performance as “Tim & Jim” at Start Line Brewing. No charge. Limited seating and occupancy.. Showtime 6pm

Tim and Jim Facebook

View Event →

Sudden Odd Behavior

Come out enjoy the high energy patio show with Sudden Odd Behavior - a four piece rock band covering classic and contemporary rock favorites. Admission is free. Seating and occupancy are limited. Show is weather dependent as our patio is not covered.

Sudden Odd Behavior Facebook

Sudden Odd Behavior Website

View Event →

CANCELLED - ROOFTOP - Dave Matthews Band Tribute

We regret that the Friday July 19th Rooftop show has been cancelled due to a band member being under the weather.

Refunds will be issued, including refunds for those who purchased tickets to the May 18th and June 14th shows.

Rooftop is scheduled for a show on October 12th, 2024.

Tickets will go on sale after Labor Day.

Rooftop Facebook

View Event →

Simple Twist of Fate

Welcome Simple Twist of Fate for a fun evening of live acoustic music. STOF plays around metro west frequently and is known for a fun night and wide range of music. Admission is free. Seating and occupancy may be limited.

View Event →

Dane Street Project

Join us in welcoming Dane Street Project back to Start Line Brewing on Saturday June 29th from 6-9pm. The Dane Street Project is an acoustic trio featuring Dean Bagdasarian, Jennifer Robinson, and Peter Wieselquist. Their interpretations of folk and pop will leave you feeling nostalgic for an era when songs had purpose, emotion, and heart. No charge, seating is limited and first come first serve.

Dane Street Project Facebook

View Event →

BJ Knights

Back by popular demand, we are proud to have local artist BJ Knights play at Start Line. A successful guitar coach and seasoned band performer, BJ has performed throughout New England with much success and strong fan support. Admission is fee but seating is limited.

bjknights.com

View Event →

CANCELLED DUE TO WEATHER - Soul Function

Cancelled due to weather. Refunds will be issued. Join Start Line Brewing in welcoming back local favorites Soul Function for a special Summer kick off with great music and fun. Soul Function is a 10-member group of veteran musicians who play horn-fueled rock, soul, and R&B, covering everything from Chicago, Tower of Power, Doobie Brothers, to Stevie Wonder, Marvin Gaye, Sam and Dave, and just about everything in between. Tickets are $20 and are required for entrance into the event space and patio area. Doors at 5pm. Showtime 6pm. Seating is first come first serve and and occupancy are limited.

Purchase Tickets Here

Check out Soul Function’s socials here! Website / Facebook

View Event →

Last Call Radio

Last Call Radio is a popular four piece jam band that brings an eclectic mix of musical genres for what will sure to be a fun filled Saturday night on our patio. Admission is free. Seating and occupancy may be limited.

Last Call Radio Facebook

View Event →

Steve Spector

Join us for a another fun performance by Hopkinton’s own Steve Spector. Show time is 7pm. Free admission. Seating and occupancy may be limited.

View Event →

South Street Band

We are stoked to have South Street Band back at Start Line. High energy classic rock showcasing music from AC/DC, Aerosmith, Bon Jovi, Boston, Foreigner, Guns 'N Roses, Journey, Led Zeppelin, Pat Benatar, Styx, Van Halen & many more! If you love great classic tunes, killer vocals and fun time - this is the band for you! Free admission. Seating is limited and first come first serve.

South Street Band Facebook

View Event →

Jennifer Tefft

We welcome back Jennifer Tefft, 2021 Winner of the New England Music Awards "Female Performer of the Year", Jennifer is a fired up, energizing presence that creates earthy music from its roots and breathes fresh, soulful, rock and roll life into them. Her music combines intense rhythms with melancholy textures and haunting vocals that wind easily from darkly ethereal to outspoken, creating her own brand of Gritty-Lush Alternative Rock. Free admission. Seating and occupancy may be limited.https://www.jennifertefft.com

View Event →

SOLD OUT! Petty Larceny

Petty Larceny is back at Start Line! Fan favorites and three time Worcester Music Awards “Best Tribute Band” winners, return to Start Line Brewing on Saturday, June 1st from 6 to 9 PM. If you love Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers, Mudcrutch, and The Traveling Wilbury’s, Petty Larceny delivers. Tickets are $15 for general admission and are required for entrance into the patio event space, starting at 5 PM. Seating is first come, first serve. Occupancy is limited.

Buy Tickets Here

Check out Petty Larceny’s socials here: Website / Facebook / Instagram

View Event →

SOLD OUT - ROOFTOP - Dave Matthews Band Tribute

Rooftop returns to Start Line Brewing! A new Dave Mathews Band Tribute Band, Rooftop debuted to a full house last summer at Start Line and will no doubt pack the patio again. If you love DMB or just some great live music on the patio with a cold beer, this show won’t disappoint. Tickets are $10. Doors at 5pm. Show 6-9pm. Seating is first come first serve and occupancy is limited.

https://www.eventbrite.com/e/864728455087?aff=oddtdtcreator

Rooftop Facebook

View Event →

TIM and JIM

Join us for a little bit of country and a little bit of Rock and Roll! Country music artist Tim Buono and Rock artist James Hewitt of “The Phase” and “The 45” team up for an acoustic performance as “Tim & Jim” at Start Line Brewing. No charge. Limited seating and occupancy.. Showtime 6pm

Tim and Jim Facebook

View Event →

The Grateful Teds

Start Line Brewing proudly presents the Grateful Teds, an acoustic Grateful Dead tribute band based in the Metrowest Boston area. Formed as a spinoff of long-time Boston-area band, Boatyard Resin, the Teds have been playing all of your favorite Dead tunes at breweries and bars across Metrowest since 2017. Free admission. Seating and occupancy may be limited.

https://www.facebook.com/GratefulTeds/

View Event →

Simple Twist of Fate

Welcome Simple Twist of Fate for a fun evening of live acoustic music. STOF plays around metro west frequently and is known for a fun night and wide range of music. Admission is free. Seating and occupancy may be limited.

View Event →

SOLD OUT! Marathon Monday Cool Down Party w/ The Spare Parts Band

Celebrate Marathon Monday at our Start Line Brewing Cool Down party featuring the Spare Parts Band on our Patio. Tickets are $15 with ticket proceeds being donated to the 26.2 Foundation. Seating is limited. Doors at 1:30pm (as local roads and security allows). Showtime is 2-5. Rain or Shine.

Buy Tickets Here

View Event →

Steve Spector

Join us for a another fun performance by Hopkinton’s own Steve Spector. Show time is 7pm. Free admission. Seating and occupancy may be limited.

View Event →

MOXIE

Welcome back local musicians and Start Line favorites MOXIE for great night of music. Admission is free. Seating and occupancy may be limited.

View Event →

TIM and JIM

Join us for a little bit of country and a little bit of Rock and Roll! Country music artist Tim Buono and Rock artist James Hewitt of “The Phase” and “The 45” team up for an acoustic performance as “Tim & Jim” at Start Line Brewing. No charge. Limited seating and occupancy.. Showtime 7pm

Back by popular demand, we are proud to have local artist BJ Knights play at Start Line. A successful guitar coach and seasoned band performer, BJ has performed throughout New England with much success and strong fan support. Admission is fee but seating is limited.

bjknights.com

Steve Spector

Join us for a special performance by Hopkinton’s own Steve Spector. Show time is 7pm. Free admission. Seating and occupancy may be limited.

View Event →

Grateful Dead Night Featuring The Grateful Teds

Start Line Brewing proudly presents the Grateful Teds, an acoustic Grateful Dead tribute band based in the Metrowest Boston area. Formed as a spinoff of long-time Boston-area band, Boatyard Resin, the Teds have been playing all of your favorite Dead tunes at breweries and bars across Metrowest since 2017. Free admission. Seating and occupancy may be limited.

https://www.facebook.com/GratefulTeds/

View Event →

Big Sunday Pre-Game Party w/ Steve Spector

Join us Big Sunday for our annual Pre-Game Party featuring Hopkinton’s own Steve Spector. Show time is 2-5pm. Free admission. Seating and occupancy may be limited. Please note our Kitchen will close at 5pm and our Tap Room will close promptly at 6pm to allow staff to view the big game off site.

View Event →

J.P. Royer

Seasoned local musician J.P. Royer performs for the first time at Start Line Brewing on Feb 8th. A frequent performer across metro west, J.P. delivers a wide range of classic songs with smooth vocals that make for a great evening. Admission is free. Seating and occupancy may be limited.

JP Royer Facebook

View Event →

Jennifer Tefft

We welcome back Jennifer Tefft, 2021 Winner of the New England Music Awards "Female Performer of the Year", Jennifer is a fired up, energizing presence that creates earthy music from its roots and breathes fresh, soulful, rock and roll life into them. Her music combines intense rhythms with melancholy textures and haunting vocals that wind easily from darkly ethereal to outspoken, creating her own brand of Gritty-Lush Alternative Rock. Admission is free. Seating and occupancy may be limited.

https://www.jennifertefft.com

View Event →
